00072 void GenericFileReaderTest::testmethod_ReadHeaderMinDP_when_file_exists()
00073 {
00074         GenericData data;
00075         GenericFileReader reader;
00076         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE;
00077         reader.SetFilename(name);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data, GenericFileReader::ReadMinDataGroupHeader));
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetFilename() == TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00080 
00081         Check_TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_GenericHeader(data);
00082 
00083         // Check the DataGroupHeader information.
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetDataGroupCnt() == 1);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetNumDataGroups() == 1);
00086 
00087         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd));
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00093 
00094         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00095         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == 0);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == 0);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 0);
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00105 
00106         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00107         ++dphBegin;
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00109 
00110         // Check that there are not any more DataGroupHeaders
00111         ++dchBegin;
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin == dchEnd);
00113 }

00169 void GenericFileReaderTest::testmethod_ReadHeader_when_file_exists()
00170 {
00171         GenericData data;
00172         GenericFileReader reader;
00173         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE;
00174         reader.SetFilename(name);
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetFilename() == TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00177 
00178         Check_TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_GenericHeader(data);
00179 
00180         // Check the DataGroupHeader information.
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetDataGroupCnt() == 1);
00182 
00183         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00184         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd));
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00186         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00189 
00190         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00191         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin != dphEnd);
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00199         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 100);
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00201         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00202 
00203         // Check the DataSetHeader name value pairs
00204         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00205         dphBegin->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00207         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00208         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00209         ++nvpBegin;
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00212         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00213         ++nvpBegin;
00214         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00215 
00216         // Check the data dataSet columns
00217         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UShortColType);
00218         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00219 
00220         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00221         ++dphBegin;
00222         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00223 
00224         // Check that there are not any more DataGroupHeaders
00225         ++dchBegin;
00226         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin == dchEnd);
00227 }
00228 
00229 void GenericFileReaderTest::Check_TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_GenericHeader(GenericData& data)
00230 {
00231         // Check the file generic header
00232         GenericDataHeader* gdh = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00233         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gdh->GetFileTypeId() == SCAN_ACQUISITION_DATA_TYPE);
00234         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gdh->GetFileId() == "test-dat-guid");
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.FileIdentifier() == "test-dat-guid");
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gdh->GetFileCreationTime() == L"2004-07-04T11:12:13Z");
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gdh->GetLocale() == L"en-US");
00238 
00239         ParameterNameValueTypeIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00240         gdh->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"Hg-U133A");
00244         ++nvpBegin;
00245         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00246         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == ARRAY_BARCODE_PARAM_NAME);
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"Barcode");
00248         ++nvpBegin;
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Parameter1");
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"Value1");
00252         ++nvpBegin;
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00254 
00255         // Check the parent header 
00256         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gdh->GetParentCnt() == 1);
00257         GenDataHdrVectorIt parentBegin, parentEnd;
00258         gdh->GetParentIterators(parentBegin, parentEnd);
00259         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(parentBegin != parentEnd);
00260         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(parentBegin->GetFileTypeId() == ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00261         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(parentBegin->GetFileId() == "test-array-guid");
00262         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.ArrayFileIdentifier() == "test-array-guid");
00263         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(parentBegin->GetFileCreationTime() == L"2004-07-01T13:14:15Z");
00264         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(parentBegin->GetLocale() == L"en-US");
00265         
00266         parentBegin->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00267         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00268         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00269         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"Hg-U133A");
00270         ++nvpBegin;
00271         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00272         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == ARRAY_LOT_PARAM_NAME);
00273         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"Thanks alot");
00274         ++nvpBegin;
00275         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00276 
00277         ++parentBegin;
00278         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(parentBegin == parentEnd);
00279 }

00305 void GenericFileReaderTest::GetDataGroupReaderByIndexTest()
00306 {
00307         GenericData data;
00308         GenericFileReader reader;
00309         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE;
00310         reader.SetFilename(name);
00311 
00312         reader.Open(data);
00313         DataGroupReader dcReader = reader.GetDataGroupReader(0);
00314         DataSetReader dpReader = dcReader.GetDataSetReader(0);
00315 
00316         int32_t rows = data.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(0).GetRowCnt();
00317         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00318         {
00319                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00320                 u_int16_t value;
00321                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dpReader.Read(value));
00322                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00323         }
00324         reader.Close();
00325 }

00339         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00340         {

00342                 u_int16_t value;
00343                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dpReader.Read(value));
00344                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00345         }

00377 void GenericFileReaderTest::ReadHeaderOfAFileWithMultipleDataGroups()
00378 {
00379         GenericData data;
00380         GenericFileReader reader;
00381         reader.SetFilename("../data/small_CDF_file");
00382         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data, GenericFileReader::ReadAllHeaders));
00383 
00384         // Get the data group names
00385         std::vector<std::wstring> names;
00386         data.DataGroupNames(names);
00387         u_int32_t count = data.DataGroupCnt();
00388 
00389         wchar_t name[100];
00390 
00391         // Check the names
00392         for (u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00393         {
00394                 std::wstring expectedName;
00395                 if (i == 0)
00396                         expectedName = L"Probe Set Names";
00397                 else
00398                 {
00399                         FormatString1(name, 100, L"biob_%d", i-1);
00400                         expectedName = name;
00401                 }
00402 
00403                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names[i] == expectedName);
00404         }
00405 }
00406 
00407 void GenericFileReaderTest::ReadHeaderOfFileWithReserveStringParameters()
00408 {
00409         GenericData data;
00410         GenericFileReader reader;
00411         reader.SetFilename("../data/small_dat_file_with_reserved_string_parameters");
00412         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data, GenericFileReader::ReadAllHeaders));
00413 
00414         // Check array id because it has reserved space and is stored as an ASCII string.
00415         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.ArrayIdentifier() == "smellsliketeenspirit");
00416 
00417         // Get the raw parameter to check the length.
00418         bool found = false;
00419         int32_t parentHeaderCount = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetParentCnt();
00420         for (int32_t index = 0; index < parentHeaderCount; ++index)
00421         {
00422                 GenericDataHeader genericHdr = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetParent(index);
00423                 if (genericHdr.GetFileTypeId() == ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER)
00424                 {
00425                         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00426                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(genericHdr.FindNameValParam(ARRAY_ID_PARAM_NAME, nvt));
00427                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetMIMEValue().Size() == AFFY_GUID_LEN);
00428                         found = true;
00429                         break;
00430                 }
00431         }
00432 
00433         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(found);
00434 
00435         // Check reserved wchar string.
00436         ParameterNameValueType result;
00437         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"fixedlen", result));
00438         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(result.GetValueText() == L"twenty-five");
00439         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(result.GetMIMEValue().Size() == 25*sizeof(u_int16_t));
00440 }
